mmorpg.chat.not_mns_weapon: You need a Mine and Slash Weapon (imbued with stats) to cast Skills.
mmorpg.chat.no_duplicate_aura: You can't equip duplicate Augment Gems.
mmorpg.chat.lack_aura_capacity: You lack the Augment capacity to equip all these Augments.
mmorpg.chat.must_be_in_map_to_accept_pro: You must be inside the same Map to accept Prophecy Rewards
mmorpg.chat.not_enough_favor_to_buy_prop: Not enough Prophecy Coins to claim the reward. Gain more Coin by killing Map mobs while afflicted with Prophecy Curses.
mmorpg.chat.prophecies_guide:
1) Kill mobs while cursed to gain Prophecy Coins.

2) Curses multiply the number of Coins you earn from kills. 

3) You can claim Prophecy rewards with your Coins below. 

4) Your Coins and Prophecy Curses reset upon entering another Map.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_altar_msg: The altar reacted to your touch! You can now open the Prophecies menu in the Hub and choose a Prophecy Curse to apply to yourself.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_please_spend: You currently have a Prophecy Curse choice pending. Please select a curse first before using this altar.
mmorpg.word.prophecyplayeraffixinfo: Your rate of §eProphecy Coins§r gain will increase.
mmorpg.item_tips.uber_boss_frag_tip: Combine fragments in the Crafting Table to create a Map That contains an Uber Portal.
mmorpg.item_tips.socket_extractor_usage: Click on gear to extract a Gem or Rune.
mmorpg.item_tips.rune_item_usage:
Socket into your gear in a specific combination to craft Runewords.
Right-click while holding to view available Runewords.
mmorpg.chat.awarded_talents: You have been awarded %1$s Talent Points.

mmorpg.stat_desc.manasteal: Restore % of attack damage as Mana. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: Restore % of attack damage as Health. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: An additional pool of vitality that gets depleted before Health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_lifesteal: Restore % of Spell damage as Health. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dot_lifesteal: Restore % of DoT damage as Health. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.energysteal: Restore % of attack damage as Energy. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_energysteal: Restore % of Spell damage as Energy. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_manasteal: Restore % of Spell damage as Mana. The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.

mmorpg.stat_desc.ignore_ele_res: Ignored resists means Resistance stat won't proc. Also means penetration doesn't boost damage.

mmorpg.stat.hp_resto_to_blood: ❤ Blood§7 Recovered by §a[VAL1]§7% of Non-Skill Health Restoration Effects.
mmorpg.stat_desc.lightning_damage_aura_c: Modifies the cost of the Augment.
Modifies the cost of the Augment.
Modifies the cost of the Augment.
spell.desc.double_strike: Rapidly slash enemies twice, dealing [calc:double_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in front of you. Double Strike has a higher chance of Critically striking.
spell.desc.flicker_strike: Teleport forward a small distance, stopping at the nearest enemy in front of you if available, and deal [calc:flicker_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area around you.
spell.desc.puncture: Thrust your weapon forward, piercing enemies in front of you for [calc:puncture] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Puncture has a higher chance of causing Bleed.
spell.desc.execute: Channel your strength into a mighty blow, dealing [calc:execute] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Execute deals double damage while Invisible and a high chance of Critically striking.
spell.desc.whirling_blades: Spawn a flurry of blades that encircle you, dealing [calc:whirling_blades] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage every 0.5s to enemies around you.
spell.desc.piercing_dagger_throw:
Quickly toss out a dagger with great force, dealing [calc:piercing_dagger_throw] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to struck enemies. The thrown dagger pierces through enemies.

§cPiercing Dagger Throw has innate Poison Chance, but this is only applies if it deals §5☀ Chaos§7§c Damage.§7
spell.desc.snipe: Imbue your next shot with immense power, charging then dealing [calc:snipe] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to your target. Snipe deals double damage while Invisible and a high chance of Critically striking.
spell.desc.fan_of_knives: Spew out knives in front of you, with each knife dealing [calc:fan_of_knives] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to enemies.
spell.desc.ricochet_shot: Fire a magically-imbued arrow that chains, dealing [calc:ricochet_shot] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage to struck enemies.
spell.desc.recoil_shot: Flip backwards while shooting an arrow that deals [calc:direct_arrow_hit] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and applies Wounds in an area.
spell.desc.backflip: Jump backwards to resposition yourself or escape danger.
spell.desc.sharpen: Empower nearby allies, increasing their Basic Attack Damage and Attack Speed.
spell.desc.smoke_bomb: Throw a smoke bomb onto the ground which upon impact, releases smoke to obscure you, causing you to lose Threat. Upon cast, gain Invisibility for a short duration, and substantially increase your Dodge and Movement Speed for an even shorter duration.
spell.desc.venom_splash_potion: Throw a magically imbued splash potion which explodes upon impact, dealing [calc:venom_splash_potion] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage in a small area. Struck enemies also receive the Venom effect, causing Basic Attacks to deal extra [calc:venom] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage. Weapon Skills also have a chance to deal [calc:venom] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage on enemies with the Venom effect.
spell.desc.venom: Deal [calc:venom] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage the the enemy.
spell.desc.mirror_image: Create mirror images of yourself through meticulous movement, greatly increasing your Dodge and Attack Speed for a short duration.
spell.desc.flame_splash_potion: Throw a magically imbued splash potion which explodes upon impact, dealing [calc:flame_splash_potion] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in a small area. Struck enemies also receive the Cinder effect, causing Basic Attacks to deal extra [calc:cinder] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area. Weapon Skills also have a chance to deal [calc:cinder] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area on enemies with the Cinder effect.
spell.desc.cinder: Deal [calc:cinder] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in a small area.
spell.desc.astral_totem: Summon a totem which restores [calc:totem_mana] Mana to allies around it.
spell.desc.rejuv_totem: Summon a totem which restores [calc:totem_heal] Health to allies around it.
spell.desc.circle_of_healing: Rejuvenate allies around you for [calc:circle_of_healing] Health.
spell.desc.hunter_potion: Drink a potion, healing you for [calc:hunter_pot_heal] Health.
spell.desc.return_summons: Regroup your summons and heal them for [calc:healing_aura] Health.
spell.desc.shooting_star: Play an enchanting sound that heals allies for [calc:shooting_star] Health. The projectile chains, healing other nearby allies.
spell.desc.wish: Heal allies around you for [calc:wish] Health.
spell.desc.healing_aura: Heal allies around you for [calc:healing_aura] Health.
spell.desc.arrow_storm: Hail arrows down upon your foes, with each arrow dealing [calc:arrow_storm] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.
spell.desc.hunters_mark: Fire a magic-imbued arrow that deals [calc:hunters_mark] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and causes struck enemies to be marked, Marked enemies take extra damage and are targeted by your Summons.
spell.desc.battle_orders: Release a commanding shout, empowering nearby allies by increasing their resources for a duration. Each subsequent level in Battle Orders increases the duration.
spell.desc.fighter_stance:
Enter §cFighter Stance§7, which increases your attack and movement speed at the cost of defenses. §cFighter Stance§7 also augments Fighter Skills to be more offensive.

§6Some Fighter Skills may do nothing if no Stances are active.§7
spell.desc.defender_stance:
Enter §aDefender Stance§7, which increases your defense at the cost of speed. Also periodically taunts nearby enemies. §aDefender Stance§7 also augments Fighter Skills to be more defensive.

§6Some Fighter Skills may do nothing if no Stances are active.§7
spell.desc.steam_cloud:
Immerse yourself in heat, dealing [calc:steam_cloud] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s. Each cast of Steam Cloud applies an additional stack of Heat, further increasing the damage of Steam Cloud.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.galvanic_blade: Imbue your weapon with galvanic energy, converting your §6☀ Physical§7 Damage into §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage. Also causes Critical §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to cast Discharge, which sends out static ripples from struck enemies, dealing [calc:galvanic_blade] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in a small area. Discharge can only trigger once off cooldown.
spell.desc.discharge: Send out static ripples from struck enemies, dealing [calc:galvanic_blade] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in a small area. Discharge can only trigger once off cooldown.
spell.desc.lightning_bolt: Enemies struck by Discharge have a chance for a bolt of lightning to strike them, dealing [calc:lightning_bolt] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage.
spell.desc.slice: Quickly slash nearby enemies, dealing [calc:slice] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area around you. Slice can trigger off of any hit, but can only trigger once off cooldown.
spell.desc.splinter: Enemies struck by your summons have a chance to cast Splinter, dealing [calc:splinter] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area around them. Splinter can only trigger once off cooldown.
spell.desc.grand_cross: Rain judgment on nearby entities, dealing [calc:grand_cross] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby allies for [calc:grand_cross_heal] Health.
spell.desc.ensnaring_melody: Play an alluring piece in an area, draining the life force and damaging the enemies for [calc:ensnaring_melody] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage per second. Charmed enemies caught in the song are also slowed and dealt an additional [calc:ensnaring_melody_charmed] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.
spell.desc.song_of_perseverance: Encourage allies with an enchanting hymn, reducing the damage they take and increasing their Health and Magic Shield Regeneration per stack.
spell.desc.song_of_valor: Empower allies with a intrepid hymn, increasing their damage and Critical Hit and Damage per stack.
spell.desc.song_of_vigor: Provide allies with a surge of stamina through a hymn, increasing their Mana and Energy Regeneration substantially per stack.
spell.desc.cyclone: Send out a torrential wind, dealing [calc:cyclone] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in rapid succession to enemies caught in the tornado.
spell.desc.nature_balm: Applies a stack of Rejuvenation to nearby allies which heals for [calc:rejuvenation] every second. Each stack of Rejuvenation further increases the heal from each stack. Also increases Thorns damage.
spell.desc.craft_arrows: Craft a small bundle of arrows.
spell.desc.power_surge: Imbue yourself with static, increasing your Cast Speed and Critical Damage.
spell.desc.prestissimo: Play an inspiring piece, increasing the speed of nearby allies.
spell.desc.protection: Steady your awareness and improve the Armor and Elemental Resistances of nearby allies.
spell.desc.armageddon:
Hail down fiery explosions on your enemies, where each explosion deals [calc:armageddon] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.power_chord: Throw out a ball of music, Charming and dealing [calc:power_chord] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Charmed enemies have their defenses reduced.
spell.desc.ritardando: Throw out a slow wave of sound, exploding upon contact and dealing [calc:ritardando] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and slowing enemies in an area.
spell.desc.resonance: Send out a quick sound wave, dealing [calc:resonance] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage. Hits against Charmed enemies explode, dealing additional [calc:resonance] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area.
spell.desc.frost_lich_armor: Surround yourself in magic, granting you supernatural powers. While Mage Armor is active, your §b☀ Cold§7 Damage from Burst Skills to Bone Chilled enemies and your §c☀ Fire§7 Damage from Burst Skills to Scorched enemies have a chance to cast Elemental Burst, which deals [calc:shatter] §b☀ Cold§7 and §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area around the enemy.
spell.desc.bone_shatter: Trigger an elemental reaction, dealing [calc:shatter] §b☀ Cold§7 and §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.
spell.desc.heart_of_ice: Applies Magic Shield to nearby allies. Also applies Soothe which restores your Magic Shield at a rapid rate over a short duration.
spell.desc.mage_circle: Summon a Magic Circle. Standing in it increases your Skill and Critical Damage.
spell.desc.undying_will: Enter a state of rage, increasing damage taken and causing kills to grant a stack of Berserk. Each stack of Berserk increases your Movement Speed and Attack Speed.
spell.desc.quake:
Smash the enemies in front of you, dealing [calc:quake] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and sending out 3 subsequent explosions which also deal damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Apply a stack of Shred on hit.

§aDefender Stance§7: Slows enemies.
spell.desc.gong_strike:
Bash enemies around you. 

§cFighter Stance§7: Deal [calc:gong_strike_fighter] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in a larger area in front of you.

§aDefender Stance§7: Deal [calc:gong_strike] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and briefly stun enemies in front of you.
spell.desc.pull:
Pull enemies in front of you to you, dealing [calc:pull] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Apply a stack of Shred to pulled enemies.

§aDefender Stance§7: Stun and Taunt pulled enemies.
spell.desc.tidal_strike:
Strike enemies in front of you, dealing [calc:tidal_strike] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Hits send out a small AOE, dealing [calc:tidal_strike_fighter] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.

§aDefender Stance§7: Apply Bone Chill to enemies.
spell.desc.shred:
Slash all nearby enemies 3 times applying a stack of Shred with each hit.

§cFighter Stance§7: Deal [calc:shred_fighter] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§aDefender Stance§7: Deal [calc:shred] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and apply an additional stack of Shred with each hit.
spell.desc.flame_strike:
Swing your blade, striking enemies in front of you for [calc:flame_strike] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Send out a Fireball upon swinging which deals [calc:flame_strike_fighter] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.

§aDefender Stance§7: Apply Scorched for 5s.
spell.desc.whirlwind:
Spin and continuously strike enemies around you.

§cFighter Stance§7: Deal [calc:whirlwind] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an increased area.

§aDefender Stance§7: Deal [calc:whirlwind_defender] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and slow enemies.
spell.desc.gale_wind:
Quickly slice the air, sending out ripples of wind, dealing [calc:gale_wind] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Each ripple strikes an additional time, dealing [calc:gale_wind_fighter] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§aDefender Stance§7: Apply a stack of Shred on hit.
spell.desc.boomerang:
Strike enemies with a chaining projectile that deals [calc:boomerang] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§cFighter Stance§7: Chain 1 additional time.

§aDefender Stance§7: Slows enemies.
spell.desc.quickdraw: For a short duration, your bow and crossbow draw speed is increased.
spell.desc.frozen_orb:
Throw out an orb of ice, dealing [calc:iceball_half] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to nearby enemies as it moves, then explodes, dealing [calc:iceball_explosion] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage in an area.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.chilling_field:
Spawn a cloud of frost, damaging enemies for [calc:chilling_field] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage every second.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.frost_flower: Summon a frost totem that applies Bone Chill and deals [calc:flower_flower] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage in an area every second.
spell.desc.frost_nova: Explode with frost around you, applying Bone Chill, dealing [calc:frost_nova] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to nearby enemies, and healing nearby allies for [calc:frost_nova_heal] Health.
spell.desc.frost_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to apply Bone Chill and deal [calc:ranger_trap] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage in area around itself. Also applies Encased, which triggers on basic attack, stunning and dealing [calc:encased] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage in an area.
spell.desc.frostball: Throw out a shard of ice, applying Bone Chill and dealing [calc:iceball] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.
spell.desc.ice_comet: Summon a comet that falls from the sky, which applies Bone Chill and deals [calc:ice_comet] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage upon impact.
spell.desc.blizzard:
Create a cloud that sends out freezing waves, damaging enemies for [calc:blizzard] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.explosive_arrow:
Shoot an arrow that upon impact, deals [calc:explosive_arrow] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.fire_nova: Summon a flaming orb which pulsates, engulfing the area in flames, dealing [calc:fire_nova] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage to nearby enemies every second until exploding, dealing [calc:fire_nova_explosion] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in a larger area. The explosion also applies Scorched for 5s.
spell.desc.fire_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to Scorched and deal [calc:ranger_trap] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in area around itself. Also applies Enflamed, which triggers on basic attack, dealing [calc:enflamed] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.
spell.desc.fireball: Throw out a ball of fire, dealing [calc:fireball] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage. Also applies Scorched for 3s.
spell.desc.magma_flower: Summon a flaming totem that deals [calc:magma_flower] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage to the nearest enemy in an area every second. Also applies Scorched for 3s.
spell.desc.meteor:
Summon a meteor that falls from the sky, dealing [calc:meteor] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage in an area.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.meteor_arrow:
Shoots an arrow that deals [calc:meteor] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage and summons a meteor that deals [calc:meteor] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage.

§aCan trigger Elemental Burst.§7
spell.desc.summon_fire_golem: Summon a Golem that can cast Magma Orb to aid you in combat.
spell.desc.chain_lightning: Strike enemies with chaining lightning that deals [calc:chain_lightning] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage. Apply a stack of Static to nearby allies upon cast.
spell.desc.charged_bolt: Shoot a slowing charged arrow that goes through enemies and deals [calc:charged_bolt] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in a radius along its path. Apply a stack of Static to nearby allies upon cast.
spell.desc.lightning_nova: Fire out an orb that explodes upon impact. dealing [calc:lightning_nova] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage to nearby enemies. Also applies a stack of Static to nearby allies upon cast.
spell.desc.lightning_spear: Throw out an electric spear, dealing [calc:lightning_spear] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage.
spell.desc.lightning_totem: Summon a lightning totem that deals [calc:lightning_totem] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage in an area every second. Apply a stack of Static to nearby allies upon cast.
spell.desc.battery_fusillade: Channel your inner-Shaman to send out waves of lightning balls, dealing [calc:battery_fusillade] §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage. Apply a stack of Static to nearby allies upon cast.
spell.desc.golem_frost_basic: Basic Attack dealing [calc:pet_basic] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage to single enemy.
spell.desc.golem_fire_basic: Basic Attack dealing [calc:pet_basic] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage to single enemy.
spell.desc.charge: Lurch in a direction quickly, allowing yourself to better position yourself in the heat of battle.
spell.desc.putrid_breath:
Infuse poison into your breath and exhale, layering the area in front of you with slow-moving clouds of poison. Each cloud deals [calc:putrid_breath] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage upon impact.

§a5 Soul Stacks§7: Also slows enemies.
spell.desc.poison_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to pull all enemies in and deal [calc:ranger_trap] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage in area around itself. Also applies Envenomed, which triggers on basic attack, applying 3 stacks of Thorns and dealing [calc:envenomed] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage in an area.
spell.desc.arrow_barrage: Shoot out arrows in rapid succession, dealing [calc:arrow_barrage] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage
spell.desc.entangling_seed: Throw out a seed that explodes and petrifies enemies. Also applies 3 stacks of Thorns. Thorned enemies consume the stack of Thorns every time they are basic attacked to deal [calc:thorn_consume] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.
spell.desc.garden_of_thorns: Barrage an area with barbs 5 times, dealing [calc:thorn_consume] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area. Each cast applies Thorns. Also gives you Inner Calm which restores [calc:inner_calm] Mana/s. Thorned enemies consume the stack of Thorns every time they are basic attacked to deal [calc:thorn_consume] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.
spell.desc.teleport: Quickly teleport yourself in the direction you're looking at.
spell.desc.black_hole:
Summon a dark sphere that attracts nearby enemies to it, dealing [calc:black_hole] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage when it expires.

§a5 Soul Stacks§7: +100% Increased Area.
spell.desc.chilling_touch:
Strike and slow enemies in front for [calc:chilling_touch] §b☀ Cold§7 Damage, and command your summons to attack them. Additionally apply a stack of the Splinter effect to struck enemies, allowing your summons to deal proc the Splinter spell on hit. Each stack of the Splinter effect increases the proc chance.

§aGenerates a Soul stack.§7
spell.desc.curse_of_agony:
Curse enemies with Curse of Agony and deal [calc:curse] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Soul stack.§7
spell.desc.curse_of_despair:
Curse enemies with Curse of Despair and deal [calc:curse] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Soul stack.§7
spell.desc.curse_of_weak:
Curse enemies with Curse of Weakness and deal [calc:curse] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Soul stack.§7
spell.desc.poison_ball:
Blast out homing balls of poison, dealing [calc:poisonball] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage.

§aGenerates a Soul stack.§7
spell.desc.poison_cloud:
Erupt with poisonous gas, dealing [calc:poison_cloud] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage to nearby enemies. Enemies also receive Soul Rupture for 10s, reducing their Chaos Resistance.

§a5 Soul Stacks§7: Hit enemies twice.
spell.desc.explode_minions:
Explodes all your nearby minions for [calc:explode_minion] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage. Summon HP stat acts as a damage bonus for this spell.

§a5 Soul Stacks§7: Deal an additional [calc:explode_minion] §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage.
spell.desc.thorn_bush:
Summon a prickly bush that deals [calc:thorn_bush]§6☀ Physical§7 Damage in an area each second and applies Thorns. Thorned enemies consume the stack of Thorns every time they are basic attacked to deal [calc:thorn_consume] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage.

§a5 Soul Stacks§7: Apply an additional stack of Thorns.
